    • Uses of SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice in org.sakaiproject.authz.api

      Fields in org.sakaiproject.authz.api declared as SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice.ALLOWED
      Security result that indicates the end user is allowed the function.
      static SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice.NOT_ALLOWED
      Security result that indicates the end user is NOT allowed the function.
      static SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice.PASS
      Security result that indicates the SecurityAdvisor cannot answer the question.
      Methods in org.sakaiproject.authz.api that return SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice SecurityAdvisor.isAllowed(String userId, String function, String reference)
      Can the current session user perform the requested function on the referenced Entity?

    • Uses of SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice in org.sakaiproject.authz.impl

      Methods in org.sakaiproject.authz.impl that return SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected SecurityAdvisor.SecurityAdvice SakaiSecurity.adviseIsAllowed(String userId, String function, String reference)
      Check the advisor stack - if anyone declares ALLOWED or NOT_ALLOWED, stop and return that, else, while they PASS, keep checking.
